name: Night Fright
description:
We all remember mother saying "Honey the monsters are not real". Well, what if they were or the monsters were mommy all along. Help Emily to find her mother and wake up from her nightmares. Teddy is always there whenever she is too scared

Controls:

WASD - To move

Shift - Run 

Space - Jump

Mouse - Camera

Teddy - not scared anymore, hint (Emily loves Teddy very much!)

Extra:

This was made for the Brackeys 2022_1 Game Jam! We are looking forward to hearing your feedback!

Made By:

Tigris(QDwazar): Designer developer

MiguelMusic: Sound Design

Makimus: Art
